ai-patthana16.32:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.32:1.1_0: For seeing the cause, for the sake of seeing, without seeing, you should give up desires with reason.
ai-patthana16.32:2.1_0: (They can be given up by seeing) again and again, not give up causes and conditions for the sake of development.
